title: Book Reviews
abstract: Book reviewed in this article: Electron Microscopy in Diagnostic Virology—A Practical Guide and Atlas. By Frances W. Doane and Nan Anderson. The Ultrastructure and Phylogeny of Insect Spermatozoa. By Barrie G.M. Jamieson. Clastic Particles. Scanning Electron Microscopy and Shape Analysis of Sedimentary and Volcanic Clast.
